overview: The world has become a dangerous place and Nicolette is ready to save the day! Wherever a problem rears it's ugly head, Nicolette is there to squash it when Daisy, a small time crook, breaks into a house to steal some dildos .  Two sexy, spandex wearing Milfs are out ot get the last spot in the coveted muff crushers boot camp. All this competition and eye candy gets them too turned on, and their little showdown quickly turns into some real-life muff crushing in the gym.
title: Hot and Mean 29
